Question 42 
 
A square footing of size 2.5 m × 2.5 m is placed 1.0 m below the ground surface on a cohesionless 
homogeneous soil stratum. Considering that the groundwater table is located at the base of the footing, 
the unit weights of soil above and below the groundwater table are 18 kN/m
3 
and 20 kN/m
3
,

Earlier, a plate load test was carried out with a circular plate of 30 cm diameter in the same foundation 
pit during a dry season, when the water table was located beyond the plate influence zone. Using 
Terzaghi’s bearing capacity formulation, what is the ultimate bearing capacity (in kPa) of the plate?
(A) 110.16  
(B) 61.20
(C) 204.00
